title: FO-12: UI Components
description:
## Scope

Delivers all UI components for FO-12: copied base components from FO-11 (with import path adjustments), modified components (welcome, familiarity, completion), and new components (start screen, check-in screens, phase-aware card flow).

## Spec Reference

`docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md` — Sections: "Reuse from FO-11", "New/Modified Components", "Selection Phase 1-3", "Start Screen", "Check-in 1", "Check-in 2"

## Key Files

- `app/fo-12/components/` — All 15 component files
- Copied from FO-11: fragment-input, heart-animation, affirmation-card, step-background, step-notifications, step-paywall, step-goal, step-context, step-tone
- Modified from FO-11: step-welcome (2 sub-steps, new copy), step-familiarity (new text+options), step-completion (30 items)
- New: step-start (motivational screen), step-checkin (parameterized for check-in 1 and 2), affirmation-card-flow (global counter, phase-aware, continuous mode)

## Worker Instructions

- Complete tasks in order (they build on each other)
- Read `docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/implementation-notes.md` before starting
- Append your learnings to `docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/implementation-notes.md` when all tasks are done
- Components should NOT import from `app/fo-12/types.ts` — use prop interfaces instead. The state machine wires everything.
- Copy FO-11 components and adjust ONLY: import paths (fo-11 → fo-12), text changes per spec
- New components: step-start is static; step-checkin is parameterized (phase 1 or 2); affirmation-card-flow needs totalLovedSoFar and target props for global counter
